name: pliable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A pliable substance bends easily without breaking or cracking: Some kinds of plastic become pliable if they're heated.
often disapproving A pliable person is easily influenced and controlled by other people: He wanted a sweet, pliable, obedient wife.
